headline: How Expansion Into Charlotte and Atlanta at Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: At the Global Communications Infrastructure Conference in September 2025, Digital Realty Trust highlighted its expansion into Charlotte and Atlanta and addressed global supply chain and power constraints while outlining growth prospects. An important insight is that despite ongoing infrastructure challenges in certain Asian markets, management expects its $850 million backlog and leasing momentum to meaningfully support results in the coming years. We'll examine how Digital Realty's focus on...

headline: Digital Realty and DXC Team to Accelerate Adoption of Enterprise AI Globally
summary: Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the leading global provider of carrier-neutral data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions, today announced a strategic collaboration with Dell Technologies and DXC to help solve enterprise AI challenges, streamline deployments and accelerate outcomes. The collaboration can bring AI directly to customers' data, on their terms, through a combination of validated use cases, private AI solutions and expert-led implementation and end-to-end management.
